column5: Does anyone know where I can launch to get to Frenchmens bay? The marina's launch is only open 8-5 mon-fri until the 16th of April. So where else could I launch that I dont have a long boot to get there? ANy help is appreciated. thx

Drive south on West Shore Boulevard until you can't go any further, turn left to go east, and keep driving until you see a sandy launch area on the north side of the road. It's free, and so is the parking.
